QuestData.Title: A Spark of Life
QuestData.Description: The Thunder-Laced Egg burns your hand as you hold it. You recall that Yalia Sagewhisper of the Shado-Pan discussing the history of the Thundering Cloud Serpents, perhaps she will know what to do with it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Thunder-Laced Egg to Yalia Sagewhisper on the Isle of Thunder.
